Defines the AbstractPixelFormat, which allows for polymorphism of the AGG pixel formats. Also defines the specialized format classes (SpecificPixelFormat, SpecificPixelFormatRGB, and SpecificPixelFormatRGBA) which take a template parameter to create the pixel format used for rendering. More...

Detailed Description

Defines the AbstractPixelFormat, which allows for polymorphism of the AGG pixel formats. Also defines the specialized format classes (SpecificPixelFormat, SpecificPixelFormatRGB, and SpecificPixelFormatRGBA) which take a template parameter to create the pixel format used for rendering.
